component.name: Serial Studio
component.summary: The universal dashboard for embedded systems

description.p: Serial Studio is an open-source, cross-platform telemetry dashboard and real-time data visualization tool. It supports input from serial ports, Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), and TCP/UDP sockets. It's ideal for embedded devices, external tools, and network services.
Available on Windows, macOS, and Linux, it's built for telemetry monitoring, sensor analysis, and real-time debugging across educational, hobbyist, and professional use cases.

ul.li: Cross-platform: Native support for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
CSV export: Save incoming data for offline analysis or processing.
Multiple inputs: Connect via serial, BLE, MQTT, or TCP/UDP.
Custom dashboards: Build interfaces with visual widgets in the Project Editor.
Advanced decoding: Use JavaScript to parse raw or binary data streams.

description.p: This is the GPLv3 version. For MQTT support, XY plotting, 3D visualization, and other advanced features, see the Pro version.
